data.name: College Kings 2 - Episode 1 Deluxe Edition Upgrade Pack
data.detailed_description:
The College Kings 2 - Episode 1 Deluxe Upgrade contains:

PEEK BEHIND THE CURTAIN
Get exclusive behind the scenes videos on a variety of the franchises' most polarizing scenes.

THE ENTIRE SCENE GALLERY UNLOCKED
Gain access to a new button inside the scene gallery that allows you to unlock all sex scenes even when you haven't played through them in the story.

BEAUTIFUL WALLPAPERS OF YOUR FAVORITE GIRLS
Get 12 different 4K wallpapers featuring Chloe, Nora, Aubrey, Riley, Lindsey, Lauren, Autumn, Amber, Penelope, Ms. Rose, Samantha and Emily.

TO GET THE CONTENT
1. Right click \"College Kings 2\" in your Steam Library and select \"Properties\".
2. Under the \"Local Files\" tab, select \"Browse Local Files\".
3. Within the local files, locate a folder called \"deluxe_content\."

data.short_description: Get everything College Kings 2 Episode 1 has to offer with the deluxe edition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

package_groups.title: Buy College Kings 2 - Episode 1 Deluxe Edition Upgrade Pack

content_descriptors.notes: The College Kings 2 Act I Deluxe Edition Upgrade contains sexually explicit wallpapers.
